page.title: 12REV.MIDDLETONS WORK.
page.content: Rev.Middleton told Daniel and Philip that he finds his work difficult because he lives in one place(Copford) and he has responsibility also for another place, so its difficult. Easthorpe is a much smaller village than Copford,therefore he has to go sometimes less often. Things happen to people in Easthorpe two or three times maybe in a month which means he has to spend more time there if people need him.It all depends on what happens.He also told us that in the country most people who live in villages know the Parson in some kind of way;he meets them more often during the week and in events at the village hall.He meets them much more in the street because he is out and about much more than he is at village hall events.
